Baseline Survey

Last Updated: 7/9/2020

Occurence indicates whether the question is currently included in either the baseline or the follow-up survey.

Please do not include kindergarten. • At least five hours of unpaid care by a relative, friend or neighbor for any child age 5 or under • At least five hours of paid care by a relative, friend or neighbor for any child age 5 or under • At least 5 hours of paid care from a home-based child care provider. Please include home-based care where the provider is paid to care for your child even if you are not making the payment. Sustain Child Care and Early Learning
